item.title: Upgrading Jenkins X
item.description: Keeping your Jenkins X environment updated can be done by command line using the jx upgrade command. Here are the most common resources that can be upgraded. A comprehensive list of upgradeable resources are available at the Jenkins X documentation site for the command. Upgrading the CLI binary Upgrade your Jenkins X command-line by opening a terminal and running jx to upgrade the binary : $ jx upgrade cli Without options, the command upgrades to the latest version of the jx binary released.
